HELPMSG:
s/sell: sells it
p/profile: prints profile
f/fish: treasure!

q/quiz difficulty: get quizzed (eg. q easy)
exit/quit: exit the game now

help: prints this again(and again)
use the pickaxe, shovel, and hoe because their awesome
